Text: Re Financial Trading Agreements Database Linkreceived a call today from the head Weather Trader at Dynegy who said they had some questions regarding their ISDA agreement and how it would relate to weather trades I took the number and said I would ask you to look into it with them Margaret Lester if not available try Paul Henry From Tana CT on PM To Melissa Ann CT Kim S CT Rhonda L CT Jefferson D CT Larry Joe CT Kevin NRON Bruce NRON Derek NRON Jean CT Diane nron Souad NRON Andrea R CT Sheetal CT Jarrod CT Scott nron Gordon NRON Pamela CT David P CT Laurel CT cc Brent HendryENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Sara CT Mark CT Susan CT Carol St CT Susan CT Michael CT Subject Financial Trading Agreements Database Link Attached is the link that will allow you access to referenced database Please note that we have just upgraded the database to add the ISDA definitions branch offices approved for trading and market disruption provisions This information should be inputted for the new master swap agreements on a going forward basis but we still need to go back and repopulate the data for the existing master swap agreements Also FYI the See drop down is our nickname for the name changes and mergers reference If an item is filled in for that entity it should show you any prior or new names for the counterparty If there is anyone else who would like the link please let me know and I will forward it to them We hope you find the information provided in this database helpful Link
Weather Derivative Templatesguess it was more like minutes instead of minutes but here you go
are the templates we could use for a nonEOL ISDA swap as well as a nonEOL deemed ISDA example and a copy of the most recent deal traded with Vitol Let me know if you need anything else
is a copy of the most recent deal done with El Paso
